org.campbelll.life

Class ParallelLife

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.campbelll.life.Life
      • org.campbelll.life.ParallelLife
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockParallelLife, LineParallelLife

    public abstract class ParallelLife
extends Life
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Object>
    Abstract class representing parallel Conway's Game of Life implementations.

    All parallel Lifes have a thread pool and submit instances of themselves as jobs to the thread pool.

    Once a ParallelLife has finished being used cleanUp() must be called to shutdown the thread pool.

    Author:
    Campbell Lockley
